argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_imadmrn | |- ( F " dom F ) = ran F |
| 2 | 1 | #P_unieqi | |- U. ( F " dom F ) = U. ran F |
| 3 | 2 | #P_eleq2i | |- ( A e. U. ( F " dom F ) <-> A e. U. ran F ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eluniima | |- ( Fun F -> ( A e. U. ( F " dom F ) <-> E. x e. dom F A e. ( F ` x ) ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl5bbr | |- ( Fun F -> ( A e. U. ran F <-> E. x e. dom F A e. ( F ` x ) ) ) |
\
 Alternate proof of ~ elunirn .  It is shorter but requires ~ ax-pow (through ~ eluniima , ~ funiunfv , ~ ndmfv ).  (Contributed by NM, 24-Sep-2006.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
